page.title: 16CLUBS CLAPHAM
page.content: Although Clapham is only a small village it has many leisure activites,groups and clubs.Here they are: Church Club,Art group, Photographic Club,W.E.A.,Sewing Class,W.I,Thursday Special and Tennis Club. The Tennis Club is the oldest club in Clapham.It started in 1936.They used to have matches against one another.If you belong to the Tennis Club you have to pay a subscription every year. Church Club and Bible Class are one club It is on a Wednesday at 6.00pm till 7.30pm.Mr Lowis,the policeman runs it.We play games mostly.Nine people go to it. The Art Group is a group where people paint and draw.It is held in the Reading Room in Clapham.There is an exhibition every year.People bring their work and other people buy.
